DOC.brief_title: Glycyphagus Domesticus Allergen Extract . Determination Vivo Biological Activity Histamine Equivalent Units ( HEP ) .
DOC.detailed_description: The objective study determine biologic activity Glycyphagus domesticus allergen extract histamine equivalent prick ( HEP ) unit , order use in-house reference preparation ( IHRP ) . The skin testing procedure , base Nordic Guidelines reference method biological calibration in-House Reference Preparations ( IHRP ) . The method intend routine testing allergen extract . The use procedure basis definition biological activity unit : `` activity allergen extract 10,000 Biological Units ( BU ) per ml ( 10 HEP per ml ) , extract provokes specific skin reaction median sensitive patient wheal size wheal provoke positive reference solution consist histamine 54.3 mmol/l ( example histamine dihydrochloride 10 mg/ml ) , solution administrate use technique ( prick test ) least 20 individual clinically allergic cutaneously reactive allergen concern '' .
DOC.criteria: Subject inclusion criterion : 1 . A documented positive case history inhalation allergy ( rhinitis and/or rhinoconjunctivitis and/or asthma ) relate Glycyphagus domesticus . 2 . Positive skin prick test available preparation allergen extract ( wheal major diameter least 3 mm ) and/or positive test specific IgE . 3 . Mean area wheal provoke histamine dihydrochloride ( 10 mg/ml ) ≥ 7 mm2 . 4 . Age ≥ 18 year ≤ 50 year 5 . Subject male female 6 . Subject must capable provide write informed consent Subject exclusion criterion : 1 . Subjects exclude due low high sensitivity Glycyphagus domesticus . 2 . Immunotherapy past 2 year allergen preparation know interfere allergens test . 3 . Use drug may interfere skin reaction . 4 . Pregnancy , dermographism , atopic dermatitis ( locally test site ) , urticaria . 5 . Any disease prohibits use adrenaline ( hyperthyroidism , arterial hypertension , cardiopathy , etc . ) 6 . Lack cooperation may interfere study , subject severe psychiatric , psychological neurological disorder .
